thread.title: Graf Mospak
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Graf Mospak

author: Graf Mospak
title: Graf Mospak
text: Painfully went over simple details for order and importance of delivery time. In every aspect of order there were problems. Customer service was nonexistent! Hung up on multiple times and placed on hold often. Customer service rep flat out said " yes, I am double talking to you and lying."! This order was for a funeral so once wrong and with refusing to correct the issue it was just a lot of money for more stress. This was listed as a "local mom and pop shop". It's nothing of the sort. Never never never again!
